titles.title: I long to dwell in you

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I long to dwell in You God
And never leave Your presence
Always fix my eyes in your face

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I long to feel Your closeness
Oh Lord, You know my heart so well
I need nothing more when You are here.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I worship you
I exoult you
Jesus enfold me in your glory
